info: Distributes critical hit chance to various actor templates
Not for use with BetterCriticals since actors that can use weapons automatically calculate crit chance.

overrides.info: Gunner - Base Template - 2 percent Crit Chance
Gunner Boss - Base Template - 4 percent Crit Chance
Raider - Base Template - 1 percent Crit Chance
Raider Boss - 1 Luck from Raider Template - 3 percent Crit Chance
Triggerman - Base Template - 2 percent Crit Chance
BoS Soldier - Base Template - 2 percent Crit Chance
BoS Scribe - Base Template - 4 percent Crit Chance
BoS Pilot - Base Template - 1 percent Crit Chance
Railroad Agent - Base Template - 2 percent Crit Chance
Synth - Base Template - 3 percent Crit Chance
Synth Courser - Base Template - 5 percent Crit Chance
Supermutant - Base Template - 1 percent Crit Chance
